item.title: 埃克森首席财务官表示，预计美国联邦贸易委员会将在年中批准先锋公司的交易
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）预计，尽管政府加强了对企业兼并的审查，但美国反垄断监管机构仍将在 6 月底前批准该公司以 600 亿美元收购先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. expects US antitrust regulators to approve its $60 billion acquisition of Pioneer Natural Resources Co. by the end of June despite increased government scrutiny of corporate mergers.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在微软（Microsoft）和 Alphabet 取得强劲收益后，股市期货走高。今天晚些时候，埃克森石油公司（Exxon）和雪佛龙公司（Chevron）的业绩以及可能预示美联储利率走向的美国关键通胀数据将成为关注焦点。交易员们还在猜测日本是否会进行干预以支撑日元。【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are pointing higher after strong earnings from Microsoft and Alphabet. Attention is turning to results from Exxon and Chevron later today and key US inflation data that may signal the trajectory of Fed rates. Traders are also speculating as to whether Japan will intervene to support the Yen.】

item.title: 汽车制造商马鲁蒂铃木因销量增加而实现超预期利润
item.description: 印度最大的汽车制造商马鲁蒂铃木印度有限公司（Maruti Suzuki India Ltd.）公布的季度利润好于预期，原因是运动型多用途车带动了销量增长，原材料成本也有所下降。【原文：Maruti Suzuki India Ltd., India’s largest carmaker, reported better-than-expected quarterly profit boosted as sports utility vehicles led an increase in sales and raw material costs eased.】

item.title: 欧盟以新数字规则打击快时尚巨头 Shein
item.description: 快时尚公司 Shein 已被纳入欧盟旨在打击网上非法和有害内容的旗舰规则的管辖范围。【原文：Fast-fashion firm Shein has been drawn under the scope of flagship European Union rules designed to clamp down on illegal and harmful content online.】

item.title: 花旗和摩根大通认为，随着美联储鹰派态度的蔓延，套利交易也将复苏
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Emerging-market currencies will be attractive for carry traders as hawkishness has been spreading from the Federal Reserve to many developing central banks, according to strategists from Citigroup Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 俄罗斯顶级谷物贸易商在与监管机构的争议中更名
item.description: 俄罗斯主要谷物出口商 TD Rif 正在更改公司名称，因为与当地监管机构的纠纷继续阻碍或推迟出境运输。【原文：Major Russian grain exporter TD Rif is changing its name as a dispute with local regulators continues to block or delay shipments out of the country.】

item.title: 美国银行称，美国大型企业将引领股市反弹，直至实际利率下降
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，美国股市将继续依赖少数几个超级大盘股来指引方向，直到实际利率上升引发经济衰退的担忧。【原文：The US equity market will continue to rely on a handful of megacap stocks for direction until an uptick in real interest rates ignites recession fears, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行计划裁减英国部门 50 个职位
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）首席执行官让-洛朗-邦纳（Jean-Laurent Bonnafe）正在加大力度控制成本，计划在其英国部门裁减多达 50 个职位。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is planning to cut as many as 50 roles across its unit in the UK as Chief Executive Officer Jean-Laurent Bonnafe ramps up efforts to curb costs.】

item.title: 股市下跌侵蚀投资回报，中国人寿利润下滑
item.description: 按市场份额计算，中国最大的人寿保险公司中国人寿保险股份有限公司表示，由于股票投资下降和债券收益率降低，第一季度利润下降了 9.3%。【原文：China Life Insurance Co., the nation’s largest life insurer by market share, said profit fell 9.3% in the first quarter as stock investment declines and lower bond yields dented returns.】

item.title: 中国为驾驶员提供最高 1380 美元的旧车置换补贴
item.description: 对于以旧换新的消费者，中国将给予高达 10,000 元（1,380 美元）的一次性补贴。【原文：China will give a one-time subsidy of as much as 10,000 yuan ($1,380) to consumers who trade in their old vehicles and buy a newer model.】

item.title: 到 2025 年底，全球只有一半的加息将被收回
item.description: 主要发达经济体的中央银行可能会收回过去两年中加息的不到一半的幅度；美国的优异表现大大重塑了这一前景。【原文：Major advanced economy central banks are likely to take back less than half of the interest-rate hikes they rammed through over the past two years — an outlook reshaped significantly by US outperformance.】

item.title: 利用佩雷拉内幕消息进行交易的德国人被判入狱三年
item.description: 法兰克福一家法院判处一名男子三年零三个月监禁，原因是他利用佩雷拉-温伯格合伙公司（Perella Weinberg Partners LP）驻伦敦银行家提供的内部信息进行交易，赚取了数百万欧元。【原文：A Frankfurt court sentenced a man to three years and three months in prison for making millions of euros trading on inside information he got from a London-based banker at Perella Weinberg Partners LP.】

item.title: 津巴布韦最新推出的稳定货币 ZiG
item.description: 在设计可信的国家货币的最新努力中，津巴布韦用 ZiG（津巴布韦黄金的简称）取代了美元。新货币单位由中央银行持有的金银和外汇储备支持。根据国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的估计，2008 年津巴布韦的通货膨胀率超过了 5000 亿美元。通胀不仅使 ZiG 一文不值，还使其成为全球的笑柄：美国 T【原文：In the latest effort to devise a credible national currency, Zimbabwe has replaced its dollar with the ZiG, short for Zimbabwe Gold. The new unit is backed by bullion and foreign currency reserves held at the central bank. All told, the ZiG is the country’s sixth attempt at establishing its own currency since 2008, when inflation crossed 500 billion percent, according to International Monetary Fund estimates. Not only did that render it worthless, it turned the unit into a global punchline: US T】

item.title: 诺伊尔表示，欧盟每年可从节约中获得 2,150 亿美元的收入
item.description: 欧洲中央银行前决策者克里斯蒂安-诺耶尔（Christian Noyer）说，如果欧盟改进储蓄目标的确定方式，欧盟每年可向实体经济转移多达 2,000 亿欧元（2,150 亿美元）的资金。【原文：The European Union could move as much as €200 billion ($215 billion) a year into the real economy if the bloc improves the way savings are targeted, former European Central Bank policymaker Christian Noyer said.】

item.title: 花旗分拆为欧洲收购大亨铸就 44 亿美元财富
item.description: 大约三十年前，包括 Donald Mackenzie、Steven Koltes 和 Rolly van Rappard 在内的一批花旗集团交易员离开了华尔街巨头，开始自立门户。【原文：About three decades ago, a group of Citigroup Inc. dealmakers including Donald Mackenzie, Steven Koltes and Rolly van Rappard left the Wall Street giant to strike out on their own.】

item.title: 尼日利亚银行股下跌，投资者逃离新规则带来的稀释效应
item.description: 自从尼日利亚中央银行宣布了新的最低资本门槛，迫使银行发行新股以来，尼日利亚银行股已经跌去了超过四分之一的价值。【原文：Nigerian banking stocks have lost more than a quarter of their value since the central bank announced a new minimum capital threshold that will force them to issue new shares.】

item.title: 日元交易员认为干预风险达到 2022 年底以来最高点
item.description: 交易员们正准备等待日本政府出手支撑日元，对受益于波动性的衍生品的需求达到了自2022年日本政府最后一次干预以来的最高水平。【原文：Traders are preparing for Japanese authorities to step in and prop up the yen, with demand for derivatives that benefit from volatility at the highest since officials last intervened in 2022.】

item.title: 由 LVMH 集团支持的 L Catterton 同意收购 Kiko 的主要股份
item.description: 由奢侈品巨头路易威登集团（LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE）支持的私募股权基金 L Catterton 同意收购意大利美容品牌 Kiko 的多数股权。【原文：Private equity fund L Catterton, which is backed by luxury giant LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE, agreed to buy a majority stake in Italian beauty brand Kiko.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水危机危及千亿英镑的英国投资计划
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的债务危机正在危及未来五年内修补英国摇摇欲坠的公用事业基础设施所需的 1,000 亿英镑（1,250 亿美元）潜在投资。【原文：The debt crisis at Thames Water is jeopardizing £100 billion ($125 billion) of potential investment required over the next five years to mend Britain’s crumbling utilities infrastructure.】

item.title: 受美国科技股溢出效应影响，新兴市场股市将迎来七月以来最好的一周
item.description: 周五，新兴市场股票基准指数上涨，创下九个月来最大单周涨幅，原因是美国企业财报证实人工智能需求旺盛，提振了亚洲科技股。【原文：The equity benchmark for emerging markets rose Friday, cementing its biggest weekly advance in nine months, as Asian technology stocks got a boost from US corporate earnings that confirmed booming demand for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国收益率上升，固定收益大腕青睐剪票
item.description: 欢迎收看《每周固定》（Weekly Fix），这是一份高收益、低期限风险的时事通讯。我是跨资产记者凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter with high yields and low duration risk. I’m cross-asset reporter Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: Blackstone 信贷主管 Dellaert 淡化与银行的竞争关系
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的信贷主管淡化了该行业与银行的竞争，即使最大的另类资产管理公司正崛起成为整个经济的主要融资来源。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s credit chief played down his industry’s rivalry with banks, even as the biggest alternative-asset managers rise to become major sources of financing across the economy.】

item.title: 日元迅速走软威胁日本电费上涨
item.description: 日元的持续下跌有可能推高日本家庭和企业的电价。【原文：The yen’s relentless decline risks pushing power prices higher for Japan’s households and businesses.】

item.title: 迪拜一家公司为南苏丹 20 年石油开采认捐 130 亿美元
item.description:
联合国调查人员称，一家不知名的阿联酋公司提供的贷款可能会在多年内占用南苏丹的大部分石油收入。【原文：

The loan from an obscure UAE company may tie up most of South Sudan’s oil revenues for many years, UN investigators say. 

】

item.title: 越南第四号领导人将在腐败调查中辞职
item.description: 越南国会主席武永定顺（Vuong Dinh Hue）在其助理因腐败调查被拘留几天后辞职，熟悉此事的人士说。【原文：Vietnam’s National Assembly Chairman Vuong Dinh Hue has resigned days after his assistant was held in relation to a corruption probe, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 高盛和摩根士丹利为 CVC 的 Multiversity 筹资 10 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利和高盛集团等银行正在筹备近 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的债务融资，这将使收购公司 CVC Capital Partners 能够继续持有其大学投资项目之一 Multiversity。【原文：Banks including Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are lining up nearly €1 billion ($1.1 billion) of debt financing that will allow buyout shop CVC Capital Partners to hold on to Multiversity, one of its university investments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 诺伊尔称欧洲央行可能在某些季度与美联储脱节
item.description: 欧洲央行前决策者克里斯蒂安-诺耶（Christian Noyer）说，欧洲央行在降息前不必等待美联储，因为两者可能会有几个季度不同步。【原文：The European Central Bank doesn’t have to wait for the Federal Reserve before cutting interest rates as the two can be out of sync for several quarters, former policymaker Christian Noyer said.】

item.title: 全日空首席执行官与日本航空公司共同呼吁日元走强
item.description: 全日空控股公司（ANA Holdings Inc.与日本航空公司（Japan Airlines Co.【原文：ANA Holdings Inc. Chief Executive Officer Koji Shibata said ¥125 to the dollar is an ideal rate for the airline, joining the chief of Japan Airlines Co. in expressing concern over the Japanese currency’s slide to 34-year lows.】

item.title: KBW 称瑞银回购面临瑞士资本规则的风险
item.description: 据 KBW 分析师称，瑞士最近提出的新银行资本规则可能会削弱瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）进行股票回购的能力，从而削弱该公司对投资者的吸引力。【原文：New bank capital rules recently put forward by Switzerland may crimp UBS Group AG’s ability to carry out share buybacks, weakening the firm’s appeal for investors, according to KBW analysts.】
